Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 11
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty XI; sheet 4 (four fragments); Hieratic text verso and recto. Recto Fragments A-D, Verso Fragments A-D. Recto: Story of Isis and Re; Other Magical Texts Verso: Micellany: Magic Spell, Hymn to Amun, More Magical Texts
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner, Hieratic Papyri Vol. 1, pp. 116-121, Vol. 2 Plate 66, Recto Fragments A-D; Plate 68, Verso Fragments A-D.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (139347) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/139347)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: fractured, fragmentary, stained Black ink (abraded) Red ink Tabbed: court plaster Displayed in Room 62 until 1992 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather (deteriorated) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete - fragmentary)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
